definition: to excuse oneself because of illness
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

pinyin: lao4 an1 suan1 dai4 xie4 bing4

sentences.english: Gaucher (pronounced "go-SHAY") disease is an inherited illness caused by a gene mutation.
sentences.chinese: 戈謝病是一種由基因突變引起的疾病。
